description: What are the odds that two Lucas Entertainment exclusives would fall in love with one another? Jonathan Agassi, a native of Israel and Hans Berlin, who lives in California but hails from Germany originally, had to meet in England for the spark of love to grown between them. Both Jonathan and Hans are versatile guys who give oral and anal sex to each other as much as they receive it. And the best part -- they both love every minute of it!
title: Lucas Exclusives Jonathan Agassi and Hans Berlin Make Love
